name: Format\InlineTextStyle
description: The object for applying text styling when not using HTML or Markdown formatting.

properties.name: rangeLength
properties.description: The length (in characters) of the portion of text to which the alternative styling should be applied.

properties.name: rangeStart
properties.description: The starting point of the text to which the alternative styling should be applied. Note: the first available character is at 0, not 1.

properties.name: textStyle
properties.description: Either a TextStyle or the name of a TextStyle object defined in the ArticleDocument.textStyles object.
